import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import NavBar from './NavBar' import Chat from './Chat' import CampaignMember from './CampaignMember' class Campaign extends React.Component{ state = { messages: [] } componentDidMount(){ fetch(`http://localhost:3000/games/${this.props.location.state.game.id}`) .then(r => r.json()).then(game => this.setState({ messages: game.messages })) } handleNewMsg = (message) => { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/games/${this.props.location.state.game.id}`) .then(r => r.json()).then(game => this.setState({ messages: game.messages })) } render(){ console.log(this.state.messages) const messages = this.state.messages.map(message =>

{ message.content }

- {message.user.username}

) return(


{this.props.location.state.game.name}

Location: {this.props.location.state.game.location}

Dungeon Master: {this.props.location.state.game.dungeon_master.name}

Description: {this.props.location.state.game.desc}

Role Playing Intensity: {this.props.location.state.game.rplevel}

Experience Level: {this.props.location.state.game.explevel}

Party:

{this.props.location.state.game.players[0] ?
: null } { this.props.location.state.game.players[1] ?

Player: {this.props.location.state.game.players[1].username}

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].class[0].name}

Character Race: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].race[0].name}

Level: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].level}

Alignment: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].alignment}

: null }
{this.props.location.state.game.players[2] ?

Player: {this.props.location.state.game.players[2].username}

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[2].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[2].class[0].name}

Character Race: {this.props.location.state.game.party[2].race[0].name}

Level: {this.props.location.state.game.party[2].level}

Alignment: {this.props.location.state.game.party[2].alignment}

: null} {this.props.location.state.game.players[3] ?

Player: {this.props.location.state.game.players[3].username}

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[3].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[3].class[0].name}

Character Race: {this.props.location.state.game.party[3].race[0].name}

: null }
{this.props.location.state.game.players[4] ?

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[4].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[4].class[0].name}

Level: {this.props.location.state.game.party[4].level}

Alignment: {this.props.location.state.game.party[4].alignment}

: null} {this.props.location.state.game.players[5] ?

Player: {this.props.location.state.game.players[5].username}

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[5].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[5].class[0].name}

Character Race: {this.props.location.state.game.party[5].race[0].name}

Level: {this.props.location.state.game.party[5].level}

Alignment: {this.props.location.state.game.party[5].alignment}

: null }

Messages:

    {this.state.messages[0] ? messages : null}
) } } const mapStateToProps = (store) => { return { currentUser: store.currentUser, selectedCharacter: store.selectedCharacter } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { LogIn: (loggedInUser) => { dispatch({ type: 'LOGIN_CURRENT_USER', user: loggedInUser }) } } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Campaign);
